name: Desperados - Wanted Dead or Alive

files.gog_installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Desperados Wanted Dead or Alive/desperados.exe

content:
files:
- gog_installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Desperados Wanted Dead or Alive/desperados.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
- task:
    app: ddr=gdi
    name: winetricks
- task:
    app: glsl=disabled
    name: winetricks
- task:
    app: multisampling=disabled
    name: winetricks
- task:
    executable: gog_installer
    name: wineexec
